comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Albert Gould Jennings was the former Suzanne Beatrix Crimmins of New York and Connecticut.  Her father was a New York lawyer, John D. Crimmins.  The Jenningses married in 1894, had a son in 1897, and the marriage was annulled in France in 1913.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for providing us with her complete name here.  We'll add it to the source data next time we update.
